Ngram¶

class game.ngram.Nonogram(matr_path: str)¶

Class representing a nonogram.

Parameters

matr_path (str) – path to matrix to load

change_matr(i: int, j: int, button: int) → None¶

Change cell depending on button.

Parameters

  • i (int) – i index of the cell to change

  • j (int) – j index of the cell to change

  • button (int) – mouse button type

check() → bool¶

Check if input matrix is correct.

Parameters

matr (np.ndarray) – matrix to check

Returns

True if correct, otherwise False

Return type

bool

progress() → float¶

Get the progress.

Return type

float
